For nearly three years, we made our opposition clear; yet it seemed to fall on deaf ears.

This delay is a win, and I want to reiterate my thanks for putting it on hold.

As a member of SASC, I sponsored legislation in this year’s NDAA encouraging the Air National Guard to start providing tuition assistance.

I applaud the Air National Guard for advancing these efforts. 

With a growing economy across the country and a booming economy in North Dakota, this move represents an important step toward helping the Guard compete for new members.

The Air National Guard selected North Dakota as one of 14 states participating in a pilot program providing college tuition assistance for its members.

Tuition assistance is an excellent recruitment tool. Being able to offer some of the same benefits as others is only fair.
